review: Dr have a very good experience in handling my case and she is very soft spoken and also she maid very comfortable in terms of the treatment and Dr is very good in convincing me to come back for the follow up as it was not that scary after the first visit and Drs assistants also helpfull in assisting me and Dr diagnosed one more tooth problem that am suffering with and she have cleared that also. Am so happy I recommend! Dhanthamdental clinc for all the dental ailments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I and my little one had amazing experience with Dr.Pavani. This visit was for my 3year Son Vedha Narshima with tooth decay and severe tooth ache. 

Dr.Pavani explained as to what treatment she is going to do. She showed the before and after treatment photos which makes it very clear for the patient to understand.

The assurance and the explanations that she gives before the procedure is extra ordinary. It's in very simple terms for anyone to understand and she lists out the pros and cons and lets us take a call. She is very straight forward and an unconventional doctor who makes you feel at ease being it just a consultation or a procedure.

She is just brilliant and a master of her trade and I highly recommend her.

Pros :

The clinic is very neat and well maintained. 
Highly professional with great expertise.
Great patience in dealing with kids.
Good environment to engage kids.

Cons: - NONE

Sri Harsha K
+91-9880698546

tags: Value for money,
review: On practo her cknsultatiin fee is rs 500 but she charged rs1000 .. stating that for explaining and spending two hours in the hospital for one patient.but actually she gave hardly her 30 minitutes only. During this 2 hours  she send us to pediatrician to know my baby fitness for tratment .like he shiuld not have coldd cough.*** **** ***** *********** i waited there for 20 min and dr took 5 min to examinine him, i reached to her cabin but she was looking another patient,after that she went down to meet someone.she came after 20 min and then talked to us regarding treatment. **** **** *** *** **** ***** ******
reply_text:
See Doctor profile for consultation fee properly.  It was Rs 700/-. She has taken two IOPA for upper arch and lower arch which is 200 per IOPA and total 400. She informed pediatrician not to charge for Consultation. You didn't even pay pediatrician for consultation. Pediatrician referral is needed for any child who was suffering with cold and need fitness to undergo General Anesthesia. We explained all. You needed free treatment and we also told that can be availed through Trust. It was offensive when you availed breast feeding room without intimating and we sustained all your aggressive behaviour for welfare of child. Parent should inform us through protocols about whereabouts. Please consult for your stress and psychological distress. We have already informed to the child abuse center for abusing your child's medical negligence and your problematic approach to the upbring of your child.

Regd,
DDH Team.

review: Dr. Pavani is the best there is. My 5 year old daughter Ananya was never scared of the appointment. The doctor made sure she was comfortable enough and went with the pace of the my child. Her soft and calming voice ensured my daughter stayed calm throughout. A lot of thanks to her.

Thanks a lot for your help doctor.

Get her opinion if you feel others are not advising you properly. She respects her fraternity a lot and never degrades other dentistâ€™s work even when I Complained.
